name: PUNCH YOUR WAY TO HEAVEN: DX
name_original: PUNCH YOUR WAY TO HEAVEN: DX
description:
Punch your way to heaven in this action packed GameBoy (Jam) game! Punch dudes in the face and climb their corpses so you can get to heaven to fight God!

Arrow keys to move around, z to punch, up+z to uppercut, x to jump. (You will need the uppercut to attack enemies above you.)

Music, art and programming by Chaoclypse. Made in a week for GBJam4.
